entry.title: Paper Accepted to USENIX Security 2014
entry.content: Our paper entitled “Never Been KIST: Tor’s Congestion Management Blossoms with Kernel-Informed Socket Transport” has been conditionally accepted upon shepherd approval to USENIX Security 2014!

entry.title: Papers Accepted to HotPETs 2014
entry.content:
Two of our submissions about integrating BitCoin and Tor were accepted to HotPETs 2014!

  • “From Onions to Shallots: Rewarding Tor Relays with TEARS”
  • “A TorPath to TorCoin: Proof-of-Bandwidth Altcoins for Compensating Relays”
